<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay in isotopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktiver Zerfall in den Isotopen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affaiblissement radioactif en isotopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deterioração radioativa nos isotopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">deperimento radioattivo in isotopi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση στα ισότοπα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">decaimiento radiactivo en isótopos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the radioactive decay of the nucleus in isotopes, and the change in ratio of atoms which have not yet decayed to those which have.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">isotopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den radioaktiven Zerfall des 
Kernes in den Isotopen zeigt und die Änderung im Verhältnis der 
Atome, die nicht noch zu denen verfallen sind, die haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre l'affaiblissement 
radioactif du noyau en isotopes, et le changement du rapport des 
atomes qui démuni pourtant délabré à ceux qui ont.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a deterioração 
radioativa do núcleo nos isotopes, e a mudança na relação dos 
átomos que não deterioraram ainda àqueles que têm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il deperimento 
radioattivo del nucleo in isotopi ed il cambiamento nel rapporto degli
atomi che ancora non sono decaduto a quelli che hanno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύουν τη ραδιενεργό 
αποσύνθεση του πυρήνα στα ισότοπα, και η αλλαγή σε αναλογία των 
ατόμων που δεν έχουν αποσυντεθεί ακόμα σε εκείνοι που έχουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el decaimiento 
radiactivo del núcleo en isótopos, y el cambio en la relación de 
transformación de los átomos que todavía no se han decaído a los 
que tienen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktiver Zerfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isotope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affaiblissement radioactif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isotopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deterioração radioativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
